I received this product at no cost through the Amazon Vine program in exchange for my honest review.These sunglasses are unusual in that the lens material is adhered to the outside of the frames, not embedded into the frame like most glasses. It remains to be seen if dust and grit build up under the edges.  Extending slightly  beyond the frame, the lenses make the glasses quite large, more than I like but others may appreciate that. The lens material provides a very clear, crisp visual experience.  I ordered the brown/red version and the brown lenses really make colors look bright and alive. I will definitely use these glasses often

I wanted some large, fun shades for summer and these are perfect!  I love the square design rather than the usual round and the little sparkles in the front are great.  They have plastic nosepieces so they don't get stuck in your hair when you push them up on your head, yay!

Nice set of sunglasses love the oversize look. They are lightweight, dark and come with A cleaning cloth and soft case.  The fit well on a larger round face, have not experienced any slipping so far. A good deal and great for summer travels.

For the very affordable price you can’t go wrong with these. They’re an very nice oversized look. They come with a nice little case and they look very stylish. Because they are made of a very lightweight plastic they’d probably break easily but as long as you’re careful you’ll be fine.

These glasses feel like they could be designer. They are very well made and the plastic is super nice. The details are just as shown in the listing and the sun coverage works well. I didn't experience any glare and use them mostly while driving. These are great for the price and I have gotten lots of complements on them already.
Pretty sunglasses. They fit my face well and they look high end. They came in a nice little pouch and came with a cleaning cloth. Decent sunglasses for the price
